_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average height above sea level of the GCU or GCU polygon.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Height above sea level in meters extracted from the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service - EU-DEM. The average is calculated for the area defined by the polygon.
Slope generated using the elevation dataset. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.
Aspect generated using the elevation dataset. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land cover classification with 2 thematic classes (Broadleaved / Coniferous).

_description.iso_639_3_eng:
The [Copernicus DLT](https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/high-resolution-layers/forests/dominant-leaf-type/status-maps/dominant-leaf-type-2018?tab=mapview) raster product provides a basic land cover classification with 3 thematic classes (All *non-tree covered areas* / *Broadleaved* / *Coniferous*) at 10m spatial resolution and covers the full of EEA39 area. The data refers to the unit polygons and the value is obtained by a mode reducer.

In this dataset we only track *Broadleaved*  and *Coniferous*, *non-tree covered* areas are not tracked.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land Surface Temperature (skin temperature)of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average land surface temperature in Kelvin. The monthly average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land Surface Temperature (skin temperature) of the GCU during summer month.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Maximum monthly land surface temperature in °C. The average of the maximum values of the GCU area is computed for the polygon foot print of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Relative humidity (RH) refers to the moisture content (i.e., water vapor) of the atmosphere, expressed as a percentage of the amount of moisture that can be retained by the atmosphere (moisture-holding capacity) at a given temperature and pressure without condensation.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Relative humidity is [calculated](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dew_point) using the temperature and the dewpoint temperature at 2 meters above surface.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average tree height of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Average tree height of the GCU in meters. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.
Average GCU above-ground biomass in t/ha. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.
Monthly average GCU Leaf Area Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.
Quantile 90% of the monthly average GCU Leaf Area Index over the GCU Polygon when the polygon is available. If the polygon is not available methods is still to be defined.
Monthly average GCU Gross Primary Productivity in kg/m2.The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average of the Annual Sum of Gross Primary Productivity.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Average of the annual sum of GCU Gross Primary Productivity in kg/m2.The monthly average is first calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries. Then the sum is realised for all month of a year and divided by the number of year in the time series (2003-2021 here).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Normalized Difference Water Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Normalized Difference Water Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Averaged canopy height iver the polygon in meters.
